SELECT count(m_comment.id) FROM tongrenlu.m_comment left join v_user on v_user.id = m_comment.user_id left join m_article on m_article.id = m_comment.article_id
and m_article.id = #{articleId} and m_article.del_flg = '0' and m_comment.del_flg = '0'

SELECT
m_comment.id as id, m_comment.content as content, m_comment.create_date as createDate, v_user.id as "userBean.id", v_user.nickname as "userBean.nickname", m_article.id as "articleBean.id", m_article.title as "articleBean.title",
FROM tongrenlu.m_comment left join v_user on v_user.id = m_comment.user_id left join m_article on m_article.id = m_comment.article_id
and m_article.id = #{articleId} and m_article.del_flg = '0' and m_comment.del_flg = '0'
order by m_comment.id desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
